00047         extraParameters = NULL;

00066 /*
00067  * Convert the file.
00068  */
00069 bool CHPFileConvertToXDA::ConvertCalvinFile(const char *fileName, const char *newFile)
00070 {
00071         Clear();
00072 
00073         // Read the input file.
00074         CHPData inFile;
00075         CHPFileReader reader;
00076         reader.SetFilename(fileName);
00077         try
00078         {
00079                 reader.Read(inFile);
00080         }
00081         catch (...)
00082         {
00083                 errorCode = UnableToOpenChpFile;
00084                 return false;
00085         }
00086 
00087         // Copy the input file object to the output file object.
00088         CCHPFileWriter outFile;
00089         outFile.SetFileName(newFile);
00090         CHPConversionUtilities::Copy(inFile, outFile);
00091 
00092         if (parentFileName.empty() == false)
00093         {
00094                 // override the parent file name
00095                 // Attempt to remove the path.
00096                 string::size_type posBS = parentFileName.rfind('\\');
00097                 string::size_type posS = parentFileName.rfind('/');
00098                 if (posBS != -1)
00099                 {
00100                         outFile.SetParentCelFileName(parentFileName.substr(posBS+1).c_str());
00101                 }
00102                 else if (posS != -1)
00103                 {
00104                         outFile.SetParentCelFileName(parentFileName.substr(posS+1).c_str());
00105                 }
00106                 else
00107                 {
00108                         outFile.SetParentCelFileName(parentFileName.c_str());
00109                 }
00110         }
00111 
00112         // Override chip type if it was set in extra parameters
00113         std::string chipType = GetChipTypeFromExtraParameters();
00114         if (chipType.length() > 0)
00115         {
00116                 outFile.GetHeader().SetChipType(chipType.c_str());
00117         }
00118 
00119         // Write the output file.
00120         if (outFile.CreateNewFile() == false)
00121         {
00122                 errorCode = UnableToWriteTheFile;
00123                 return false;
00124         }
00125         if (outFile.Save() == false)
00126         {
00127                 errorCode = UnableToWriteTheFile;
00128                 return false;
00129         }
00130 
00131         return true;
00132 }
00133 
00134 std::string CHPFileConvertToXDA::GetChipTypeFromExtraParameters()
00135 {
00136         std::string arrayType;
00137         if (extraParameters != NULL && extraParameters->size() > 0)
00138         {
00139                 for (ParameterNameValueTypeVector::const_iterator ii = extraParameters->begin(); ii != extraParameters->end(); ++ii)
00140                 {
00141                         if (ii->GetName() == ARRAY_TYPE_PARAM_NAME)
00142                         {
00143                                 arrayType = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(ii->GetValueText());
00144                                 break;
00145                         }
00146                 }
00147         }
00148         return arrayType;
00149 }
